name: Hotel Atlantic
description: Hotel Atlantic is centrally located by the waterfront in Aarhus just a short walk from the central station. Close to the hotel, youll find the large city library and culture centre, DOKK1, Den Gamle By (The Old Town), Latinerkvarteret, Aarhus Street Food and good shopping and restaurants. Start your day with our complimentary breakfast on the top floor and enjoy views of Aarhus city or the harbour. You can even spot The Rainbow on top of Aros Art Museum. Feel at home in our 102 modern and comfortable rooms, each offering great views as well. Relax with a Danish beer in the lobby bar. Hotel Atlantic is your perfect base to explore Aarhus.iHotelier/iStay

name: Radisson Blu Scandinavia Hotel, Aarhus
address: Thomas Jensens Alle 1, Aarhus, Central Jutland
description: Conveniently situated, Radisson Blu Scandinavia Hotel Aarhus offers easy access to Aarhus's popular hot spots. The numerous facilities this modern hotel has to offer include a coffee bar, an executive floor and a 24-hour reception. Rooms at Radisson Blu Scandinavia Hotel provide a stylish space to unwind, complete with a mini bar. Each have an in-room safe, a laptop safe and a private bathroom with a hair dryer. Radisson Blu Scandinavia Hotel Aarhus's restaurant is open for lunch and dinner and is a convenient place for those who want to stay close to everything the property has to offer. A selection of cafés and restaurants can also be found in close proximity to the property. Radisson Blu Scandinavia Hotel is close to Arhus Central Station, making it easy for guests to explore Aarhus and its surrounding areas. Aarhus Cathedral and Aarhus City Hall are within walking a distance.Revato

name: Comwell Aarhus
description: Set in Aarhus city centre, Comwell Aarhus Dolce by Wyndham has its own restaurant and 2 fitness centres. Wi-Fi is free. Bruuns Galleri Shopping Centre is 100 metres away, while Aarhus Train Station is 600 metres away. Rooms will provide you with a flat-screen TV, safety deposit box and desk. Each has a private bathroom with shower and hairdryer. At Comwell Aarhus Dolce by Wyndham, you will find a bar and 24-hour front desk. There is also a large outdoor terrace. Other services include a lounge and dry cleaning. Aarhus Airport is 45 km from the hotel.

name: Hotel Villa Provence
description: Situated by Aarhus’ canal area, 5 minutes’ walk from Aarhus Train Station, this elegant yet intimate boutique hotel offers a popular breakfast with French delicacies. Wi-Fi is free throughout the premises. All the individually designed rooms at Villa Procence have a flat-screen TV and luxury toiletries by Molton Brown. Some also include a seating area. Guests can relax with a drink in Villa Provence’s café or in the cosy cobblestone courtyard with tall lime trees and fountains. A French-inspired breakfast is served each morning. Hotel Villa Provence’s central location provides easy access to shopping, dining and culture. Aarhus Cathedral, dating back to the 12th-century, is just 300 metres away.

name: Hotel Royal
description: This luxury hotel is set in an elegant, Neoclassical building built in 1838. It offers a casino. ARoS Art Museum is 15 minutes’ walk away. Hotel Royal’s impressive interior features stained glass windows, 300 art pieces and glass chandeliers. All rooms have antique furniture, a flat-screen TV and tea/coffee facilities. Breakfast is available every day. Royal Hotel is 300 metres from Skolebakken Train Station and Aarhus Harbour.

name: Book1 By Brøchner Hotels
description: BOOK1 Design Hostel features a restaurant, bar and a shared lounge located at Mølleparken in Aarhus. Around 700 metres from Aarhus City Hall, the property is also 1 km from Aarhus Central Train Station and offers free WiFi. The accommodation occasionally provides evening entertainment. An organic buffet breakfast is available daily at the hostel. Popular points of interest near BOOK1 Design Hostel include ARoS Aarhus Art Museum, Den Gamle By, the Botanical Garden, Aarhus Cathedral and The Latin Quarter. The nearest airport is Aarhus Airport, 42 km from the accommodation.

name: Scandic The Mayor
description: Conveniently situated, Scandic The Mayor allows for easy access to Aarhus's best hot spots. It has a gym, as well as free Wi-Fi, an express check-in and check-out feature and a sauna. Scandic The Mayor features rooms equipped with a shower, a hair dryer and a flat-screen TV. They feature an in-room closet, a desk and a private bathroom. Scandic The Mayor's in-house restaurant, GÄST, is a popular spot to enjoy a meal. A selection of dining options are also found in the surrounding area. Aarhus's attractions, including the ARoS Aarhus Art Museum, the Viking Museum and Danske Commodities, are within easy walking distance of Scandic The Mayor. Arhus Central Station is just a two-minute stroll, linking guests with the rest of the city.Revato

name: Scandic Aarhus City
description: Strategically located in the middle of the city, this 4-star hotel makes for an excellent base in Aarhus. It is close to Aarhus City Hall, eateries and shops. Scandic Aarhus City has sweeping city views, plus free Wi-Fi, an express check-in and check-out feature and a 24-hour reception. Guests can exercise in the fitness centre, or rent a bicycle and discover the surroundings. The luxurious feel of each room at Scandic Aarhus City is complemented by facilities such as flat-screen TVs. They each offer a private bathroom, an in-room safe and a desk. Those staying at Scandic City Aarhus can indulge in a drink at Lobby Bar, before savouring a meal at Restaurant L'ost. A generous buffet breakfast is on offer every morning. The hotel is ideally located for discovering Aarhus with Aarhus Cathedral within walking distance. Guests can also visit Danske Commodities and the ARoS Aarhus Art Museum.Revato

name: Zleep Hotel Aarhus Skejby
description: Set in Aarhus, 32 km from Memphis Mansion, Zleep Hotel Aarhus Skejby offers accommodation with a fitness centre, free private parking, a shared lounge and a bar. With free WiFi, this 3-star hotel offers luggage storage space. The property is non-smoking and is located 5 km from Steno Museum. At the hotel, all rooms include a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. Buffet and continental breakfast options are available every morning at Zleep Hotel Aarhus Skejby. Aarhus Natural History Museum is 5 km from the accommodation, while Aarhus University is 5.1 km from the property. The nearest airport is Aarhus Airport, 36 km from Zleep Hotel Aarhus Skejby.

name: Sofs Boutique Hotel
description: This intimate boutique hotel is ideally situated in central Aarhus's Latin Quarter. University Park and Skolebakken Train Station are both about 10 minutes' walk away. It offers free WiFi, a charming garden and uniquely decorated rooms. Each has a TV as well as organic soaps, creams and shampoos. Some rooms have a work desk. Guests can start their day with a satisfying organic breakfast, which can be ordered in advance or upon arrival. Bicycles can then be rented on site to explore the surroundings. Den Gamle By, The Old Town, an open air museum of Denmark’s historic buildings, is 1 km away. Aarhus Hospital is a 10-minute walk away. Hotel staff will gladly recommend other area attractions, restaurants and designer shops.

name: Milling Hotel Ritz Aarhus City
description: Set in a 1930s building, this boutique hotel is 2 minutes’ walk from Aarhus Train Station and airport shuttle buses. Hotel Ritz Aarhus City offers free WiFi and a steakhouse restaurant with a wine cellar. Parking is available. Flat-screen TVs with satellite channels and writing desks are standard features at Hotel Ritz. Each room is decorated in a art decor style and has a modern bathroom. The in-house MASH restaurant serves chunky steaks as well as grilled lobster, fish and chicken. Hotel Ritz is 5 minutes’ walk from the Scandinavian Congress Center.

name: Radisson Red Aarhus
description: Radisson RED Aarhus has a fitness centre, shared lounge, a restaurant and bar in Aarhus. This property is set a short distance from attractions such as Aarhus Art Building, Aarhus Cathedral, and Steno Museum. The property is non-smoking and is situated 36 km from Memphis Mansion. All rooms are fitted with a TV with cable channels, fridge, a kettle, a shower, free toiletries and a desk. The rooms have a private bathroom, a safety deposit box and free WiFi, while selected rooms also boast a terrace and some have city views. At the hotel each room has bed linen and towels. A continental, American or vegetarian breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. The area is popular for cycling, and bike hire is available at Radisson RED Aarhus. Guests can enjoy playing billiards and table tennis, or take advantage of the business centre. Speaking Danish, German, English and Norwegian at the reception, staff are always at hand to help. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include ARoS Aarhus Art Museum, Aarhus City Hall and Train Station Arhus. The nearest airport is Aarhus Airport, 38 km from Radisson RED Aarhus.

name: Scandic Aarhus Vest
description: Ideally located in Aarhus, the hotel provides modern accommodation an easy drive from Aarhus University. It offers complimentary Wi-Fi, free bicycle rental and a sauna. This 4-star hotel provides a 24-hour reception, an express check-in and check-out feature and meeting rooms. It is pet-friendly and has free public parking on site for those travelling with a car. All the rooms at Scandic Aarhus Vest provide an in-room closet and blackout curtains. There are also a number of rooms specially designed for families. Providing Mediterranean and local cuisine, Scandic Aarhus Vest's relaxed restaurant is an ideal dining option for guests who wish to to enjoy a meal close to their accommodation. In the evening, guests are able to wind down in the comfortable lounge bar. Scandic Aarhus Vest is within walking distance of Bazar Vest. Aarhus Cathedral and Aarhus City Hall are within a short drive from the hotel.Revato

name: Cabinn Aarhus
description: This hotel is located in central Aarhus and just a 3-minute walk from Aarhus Harbour. It offers free WiFi and in-room tea/coffee facilities. Aarhus Central Station is 900 metres away. The compact rooms at Cabinn Aarhus have cable TV channels and private bathrooms with showers. During warmer weather, guests can enjoy city views while having breakfast. Fruit, snacks and sandwiches are available at the 24-hour reception. Staff can help with travel directions or offer tips on local restaurants, bars and attractions. The 13th-century Aarhus Cathedral is Denmark’s tallest and is found directly opposite Cabinn Aarhus Hotel.

name: Helnan Marselis Hotel
description: Overlooking Aarhus Bay and the Kattegat Sea, this hotel has a fitness area, sauna, small indoor swimming pool and free Wi-Fi. Helnan Marselis Hotels rooms are located in the main building or in an annex. Each has a TV and private bathroom. Tivoli Friheden amusement park is 2.2 km away. Helnan Marselis Hotel is 15 minutes walk from Marselisborg Castle and 10 minutes drive from Aarhus city centre.

name: Hotel Oasia Aarhus City
description: At Hotel Oasia, BW Signature Collection in Aarhus, the main priority is quality and service. Here you can sit back and enjoy the elegant and discreet luxury that forms the framework of everything in the hotel. Everything is carefully selected to give you the best experience possible. The hotel's interior design is characterized by clean lines and Nordic design - with a focus on aesthetics and functionality. The hotel is furnished with designer furniture from some of the largest designers in the Nordic region. In the rooms you will find custom-made Montana furniture, Hastens beds, Bang & Olufsen TVs and telephones as well as lounge chairs from Theselius and Kjaeholm. If you come to explore Aarhus - the city of smiles, then Hotel Oasia, BW Signature Collection is the ideal starting point. The hotel is located just a few hundred meters from ARoS Aarhus Art Museum, Musikhuset and Scandinavian Center. Within walking distance are the market town museum Den Gamle By, The Cathedral, Vor Frue Church and The Women Museum. If you bring a car, you can in a few minutes go on a trip to the Memorial Park with the Queen's summer residence Marselisborg Castle. In both the north and south of the city are forests and beaches, and in the Marselisborg forests south of Aarhus you will find the Moesgaard Museum with the 2000-year-old Grauballe Man.bestwestern.com

name: Den Gamle Kro Hornslet
description: Located in Hornslet, 30 km from Memphis Mansion, Den Gamle Kro Hornslet provides accommodation with a garden, free private parking, a terrace and a restaurant. Providing a bar, the property is located within 23 km of Djurs Sommerland. The hotel also offers free WiFi as well as a free shuttle service. At the hotel, each room has a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen, towels and a patio with a garden view. Guest rooms include a wardrobe. Den Gamle Kro Hornslet offers a buffet or gluten-free breakfast. Steno Museum is 23 km from the accommodation, while Aarhus Natural History Museum is 23 km away. The nearest airport is Aarhus Airport, 18 km from Den Gamle Kro Hornslet.
